eu.monnetproject.util

Class Logging

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.monnetproject.util.Logging

  • public final class Logging
extends Object
    Interface for simple console based logging. Provides a consistent logging behavior across the entire project
    Author:
    John McCrae

        public static void setLogLevel(String regex,
               Level level)
        Set the logging policy for a particular set of classes
        Parameters:
        regex - A regex matching suitable classnames
        level - The level to set the components to
